programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team uncovers a sinister plot by a private detention centre contracted by the government to house undocumented immigrants.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Navy Lieutenant Max Landry asks the New Orleans field office for help when he suspects his girlfriend is a spy. Also, Lasalle faces another devastating dead end as he searches for his brother’s last known whereabouts.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Zankou tries to lure the sisters out of their house so he can search for the Nexus.Guests: Oded Feher, Collective Soul..

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters must find the guardian of Pandora's Box to return any released spirits.Guests: Michelle Hurd, Brooke Nevin..

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: After a power-hungry sorceress casts a spell on Phoebe, their souls switch bodies.Guests: Suzanne Krull, Oded Feher, Seamus Dever..

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Unbeknownst to the Charmed Ones, Wyatt's new imaginary friend is actually a demon.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Lasalle hopes to avenge his brother's murder by tracking a drug ring in Alabama he believes is responsible. Also, when Pride assists with the case, he crosses paths with Eddie Barrett, an elusive individual who knows more than he is sharing.Guests: Eddie Cahill..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Following a natural gas explosion at a movie theatre, the NCIS team discovers the gas company has been hacked and more explosions could be triggered.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Sebastian calls the NCIS team to assist with a possible kidnapping case when a dignitary’s son he was assigned to protect disappears from a local concert venue.Guests: The Revivalists..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After Eddie Barrett provides an alibi witness, Pride and the team are more determined than ever to find a break in the case and avenge Lasalle’s murder.Guests: Eddie Cahill..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride is cut off from the team and backed into a corner after the investigation into Eddie Barrett uncovers a malicious plot.Guests: Eddie Cahill..

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: Since completing the legendary 12 labours, Hercules has been living the life of a mercenary alongside six companions. When the King of Thrace enlists the band to help defeat a savage warlord, Hercules must once again use his strength for good to prevail.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: The agency Monarch battles the monsters known as Titans.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: After a research vessel is attacked, a prehistoric shark that was believed to be long-since extinct is found living in the ocean's deepest depths, and as it emerges to shallower waters a rescue diver who encountered it years prior must stop it.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a team of explorers and soldiers are brought together to explore an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. When they arrive, they realize it is the home of a monstrous gorilla named Kong, who protects the island from deeper monsters.

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: A retired car thief re-enters the business to steal 50 cars with his crew in one night.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: When a man impersonating Lasalle attempts to free a young woman from jail, the team investigates both the imposter and the prisoner. Also, Pride’s daughter pays him a surprise visit.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Racial tensions rise in New Orleans when a white NOPD officer shoots a black Navy officer he believed was armed in the middle of a busy street party.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team partners with several federal agencies to track a sniper who is targeting crowded events in the city.Guests: Steven Weber, Derek Webster, Jared Day, Doris Morgado, Steven Waldren, Kwajaylyn Brown, Lenita Henderson..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride faces further backlash from the FBI when he helps former Navy Intelligence Analyst Elvis Bertrand, who is the lead suspect in a multiple homicide case.Guests: Tom Arnold, Grace..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a decorated petty officer is found dead inside a sports arena, evidence leads Pride and the team to a kidnapping case of a petty officer who was last seen in Mexico.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
